pda.view

Class GalleryView

  • java.lang.Object
    • pda.view.GalleryView

  • public class GalleryView
extends java.lang.Object
    The ApercuView is the page displaying a modified image
    We chose this image on the GalleryView.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Florent Catiau-Tristant and Mehdi Haddad

      • creerInterface

        private void creerInterface()
        Create the interface of the Gallery page.
        It contains :
        • The name of the application : Gallery
        • The back button
        • The images of the chosed save directory

      • resizeIcon

        private javax.swing.ImageIcon resizeIcon(java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageSource,
                               int l,
                               int h)
        Resize an image to the given dimension without alter it.
        Just to display it on a JLabel.
        Parameters:
        imageSource - Is the source image, without any modifications
        l - Is the width of the new Icon
        h - Is the length of the new Icon
        Returns:
        Return an ImageIcon, resize to the given dimensions
